page.title: 12HOUNSDOWN SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in ninteen sixty nine so it is sixteen years old. It is a secondary comprehesive school and was opened by Mr. Peter Kay who is retiring as headmaster this year. The school took a year to build and the cost was in total half a million pounds, including the cost of the ground. The school and the grounds take up fifteen acres. The land was an anti-aircraft gun site during the war. There are eight hundred children in the school and since opening seventy teachers have worked here. The swimming pool cost about ninety thousand pounds to install. For running it these things must be accounted for:- wages, heating, chemicals, maintenance, cleaning water and building repairs, in total seventy seven thousand, five hundred and eighty four pounds a year!
